ADD_TO_CART_MODAL.TITLE: Chest added to the cart!
ADD_TO_CART_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: This chest has been added to your cart. You can view your cart by clicking the button below.

EMPTY_CART_CTA.TITLE: Your cart is empty
EMPTY_CART_CTA.DESCRIPTION: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet. Click the button below to continue shopping.

CHANGE_QUANTITY.TITLE: Change quantity
CHANGE_QUANTITY.DESCRIPTION: Select the quantity you would like to purchase.
CHANGE_QUANTITY.SUCCESS: You have successfully changed the quantity of this item.

SUBTOTAL.TITLE: Subtotal
SUBTOTAL.DESCRIPTION: Taxes will be calculated at checkout.
